description: This file defines a React functional component 'DeviceForm' which provides a form for creating new devices with client-side validation, submission via API call, and toast notifications for user feedback.

methods.name: DeviceForm
methods.description: React component that renders a device creation form with validation and submission logic.

methods.name: validateForm
methods.description: Validates the form inputs for device name and IP, updating error state accordingly.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission; calls API to create device, manages loading state, resets form, and shows success/error toasts.
